text: Claim Jumper is an American restaurant chain. It has 11 locations as of October 28th, 2023. The company is based in Houston, Texas. Restaurateur Craig Nickoloff opened the first Claim Jumper in Los Alamitos, California, on September 27, 1977. The original restaurant had a large menu and an atmosphere inspired by California's Gold Rush of 1849. Category:American restaurants Category:1977 establishments in the United States
title: Claim Jumper
